phrases: Raise your eyes you can see shooting stars up in the night sky
Raise your eyes you can see shooting stars up in the night sky
The sound resonates Into my heart, so hard and deep
A field of stars spans endlessly
And through it I carve a passageway
In step with time as generations change
Close your eyes and listen closely
Shooting stars stream on silently until the goodbye
Keep the light inside of you, never give up do not ever lose
Transcend time and you will prove, there is a special place for you
A blaze of glory is there,
It is all a part of our estate; life is our story to create
Raise your eyes you can see shooting stars up in the night sky
Wishes speak from ages old by voice of light Throughout the age, never fade away
A secret fire, a scream of light, voices calling through twilight
Cast your thoughts to the wind, hang your wishes on the moon
Live your life with all your strength for dreams will reach you very soon
Raise your eyes you can see shooting stars up in the night sky
Wishes speak from ages old by voice of light
Throughout the age, never fade away
Someday your dream will find its place somewhere
Captain of the Squad 3, Gin Ichimaru.
A guardian of the gate is not supposed to open the gates.
I did not expect that someone like him would come all this way.
Even if these kids have become strong,
Captain levels strength is beyond imagination.
We must avoid that worst possible scenario!
Opening the gate is what is expected of a gatekeeper who has lost!
A gatekeeper who lost is not opening any gates.
What the hell are you doing?!
Do not come now and try to butt in, you fox face!
Anyone who would attack an unarmed guy
You are not scared of me?
I am only just getting started!
No way I can forgive guys like this!
All the more reason why I cannot let you pass.
Why are you standing so far back?
Are you going to throw your short sword?
It is not a short sword.
It seems you are all right.
Sorrythe gate closed because of me
No, your opponent was Gin Ichimaru.
Be glad that you were not hurt.
Souls who come illegitimately to Soul Society
without the aid of Soul Reapers are called Ryoka,
and are said to be the because of all kinds of calamities.
I am the elder of the Rukon District.
I witnessed everything that happened just now.
There are many rotten Soul Reapers,
but Jidanbo is a native of the Rukon District.
And he is always kind to us.
You fought Gin Ichimaru for Jidanbo.
That is why you must be a good person.
Yes, just leave it to me.
All you have to do is desire it.
You put on some weight, huh?
That is because you only knew me as a parakeet.
Here, you do not change at all.
You stay the same as when you first get here.
It is kind of run down, but it is cool during summer and nice.
And my family are all really nice.
He is like my big brother.
In Soul Society, or rather the Rukon District,
people who are not related form family-like units and live together.
People who died in different places, at different times, live together.
It is rare for one to meet up with a real family member who died earlier.
Do not the Soul Reapers reunite you with your family?
By the way, I died in 1947 in Yamanashi Prefecture.
It is way before Shibata died.
Our age, the location, we are far apart.
Then you have not seen your mother yet?
No, although I am looking for her.
You have all of us, Yuichi.
We are all like him in the beginning, but we change with time.
II will not see my mom again
I am sorry, but can I stay with Shibata for a bit longer?
By the way, why are you here, Mister?
You are not dead, are you?
Is not that your Soul Reaper friend?
Even if he goes that high up, he will not be able to see beyond the gate.
But he will still keep looking,
That is the kind of guy Ichigo is.
I guess I was around your age
when I started worrying about my looking different than everyone.
And I had this amazing strength I could not handle that was different from them.
What is this power I got?
I have a feeling that coming here will give me some clues.
I thought I would risk everything to search for answers.
You are really giving it your best, huh Mister?
That is why, Yuichi, do not give up.
If you keep searching without giving up,
Right, let us make a promise.
At least speak up if you are here.
Give up breaking through the gate?
Once the gate has been opened,
the security on the inside becomes even tighter.
Which means the same strategy is not the best one.
There will not be much difference with this one.
If we cannot use the gate, we must enter another way.
Elder, do you know the Kukaku Shiba?
I understand she is someone who constantly changes residences.
I have not been able to find out where she lives now.
You are not planning to go through the wall with that!
What is a boar doing here?!
Been a long time, Old Man.
Ganju, what are you doing here?!
I come to visit after a long time and I get that?
What is a dirty Soul Reaper doing here?
What is a dirty Soul Reaper doing here, I asked!
Trying to goad me like that!
I got a name you know!
This is no time to drink tea!
You do not know who I am?!
Do not even want to know.
Self-professed Crimson Bullet of West Rukon District!
Self-professed West Rukongai's Top Soul Reaper Hater!
Will not let you get in Big Brother's way.
If you really want to get involved in this fight
While I am alive, no Soul Reaper will be allowed to step foot
If you want to fight, I will fight you.
I kicked you the second time around, idiot!
Do not use up your strength in a meaningless fight.
If you want us to stop, tell him.
Getting worked up for such a silly thingthe fool!
It seems we are destined to fight, you and me.
He is not an evil Soul Reaper!
There is no good or bad.
Kurosaki does not have his Zanpaku-to!
Do not think you can win with a bigger sword!
Damn, if that did not drop you, you are pretty tough.
send a rhapsody filled with treasured thoughts
To the people who have always held me up.
Ill always be grateful for who you are.
I was casually walking through town
Around the time dusk fell and the city was bathed in red
It was an afternoon with crowds of people coming and going
I do not know why but I just stood there and watched
Then my cell phone started to vibrate and I made myself move
hoping it could fill in this hole in my heart
We got to hold each other up
I send a rhapsody filled with treasured thoughts
To the people who have always held me up.
Ill always be grateful for who you are.
The next Bleach: Orihime Inoue's Architectural Visits,
will be coming from Kukaku Shiba's house in West Rukon District.
It is a gorgeous wooden structure surrounded by open land.
What is the secret to this building?
